programme.title: St Patrick's Day controversies
programme.short_synopsis: Controversies behind the NYC St Patrick's Day parade: Gay rights and Northern Ireland.
programme.medium_synopsis: The controversies behind New York's St Patrick's Day Parade, US misconceptions about the status of Northern Ireland and American Irish historical memory of the famine of 1845/6.
